title: Annie should get a Visual + Voice update that reflects her video; Annie: Origins.
body:
Annie really needs thematic updates desperately. Her voiceactor was pretty talented, but Annie is a relic of the past back when Riot would use a couple voiceactors to voice every champion, and because of that limitation a lot of them really don't fit at all. She also looks a bit like a weird demon child with her eyes and hair. This brings me to my main point;

Make ingame Annie look and sound like she does in Annie: Origins. She seems more like a little girl here, instead of a cartoonish parody of a child. Annie doesn't necessarily look horrible, but after seeing her video, it's painfully obvious that her current visuals and voice are out of place and subpar.

replies.body: *whispering softly* and let me write Annie in Wonderland's vo, let me do it, hey, psssst hey
Sounds like someone has a few voice line ideas..... any interesting one?
Well, if you need to show support from the player base to convince the power that be, you can show mine :)

> [{quoted}](name=Carnival Knights,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=WwpWrWTf,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-09-05T18:22:59.865+0000)
>
> *whispering softly* and let me write Annie in Wonderland's vo, let me do it, hey, psssst hey

You say this only days after I rerolled an Annie un Vonderland skin shard

I'm on to you {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
Make.  It.  Happen.

Annie needs some in game voice lines more then anything. She has so few voice lines and interactions it really makes it hard to really understans her personallity.

I do like that they give Nunu a voice line to hint at him having a crush on her though.

> [{quoted}](name=Annie x Zoe Main,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=WwpWrWTf,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-09-06T00:23:36.785+0000)
>
> Annie needs some in game voice lines more then anything. She has so few voice lines and interactions it really makes it hard to really understans her personallity.
> 
> I do like that they give Nunu a voice line to hint at him having a crush on her though.

Annie and Nunu for life! :D They're too perfect for each other now.

But the thing is...I'm predicting that this colorful flower mage will actually be Daisy, Annie's adopted sister. If it is her...who should Nunu choose? {{sticker:sg-janna}}
Oh, I didn't want another little cheery girl but Daisy being the flower mage could be a real cool twist!

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=WwpWrWTf,comment-id=000600000001,timestamp=2018-09-06T01:02:12.071+0000)
>
> Oh, I didn't want another little cheery girl but Daisy being the flower mage could be a real cool twist!

We have several cheery girls in the game besides Annie. Lulu, Zoe, Tristana, even Lux. 

Besides, Daisy seems a bit sassy. I'd like a cute flower girl with sass.

No I know that's why I said i didn't want another one.

I'd prefer an old lady, a dude, or a female yordle in that order.

oh could you imagine?!
...
But I doubt it's that.  I'd be problematic if they had two characters named "Daisey" in-game.
She could go by another name.

If I remember correctly then Riot confirmed that the origins video was actually made with Annies VO in mind.

The plan seems to be that as Annies story moves on,she becomes the annie that we have ingame eventually.

I remember this too. 

It sucks though because the Annie we have in game is very underdeveloped and lacking.

>She also looks a bit like a weird demon child with her eyes and hair.

Well her title is "The Dark Child" so what did you expect?

She already had a VU in 2013 and had some Gameplay work in 2016
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-M7aO1mP9hwQ/UPc29eOrLHI/AAAAAAAAAv4/xyMDPdeypoA/s1600/annie_before_after.jpg

  Riot also mentioned that her look in the origins video is just that, her origin. It's who she WAS, what we see in game is who she is NOW, and thus they wouldn't be changing her.

Yeeah but she won't because Riot doesn't see the value in doing VO updates on their own. It's just throwing money into a pit really. When a VGU gets done they do it because they're already altering gameplay and visuals which will attract players back.
Annie should get a full VGU, cause her gameplay could really use some depth.

Even a skin that makes her and her abilities look like oil paintings would be fantastic. 

I don't even play Annie, and I'd buy it in a heartbeat.
Youre completely right... Thats the problem with the Lore team.. They dont consider in game characters so they just update champion Bios and then the Bio doesnt fit the in game quotes and looks :/
I'm sure they consider it, they just can't go around updating every character along with the bio or else it would take FOREVER for anyone to get a new bio.
